Reviews.Title: “Avoid this disgusting low rate so called hotel”
Reviews.Author: vince1961
Reviews.Content: stayed 25th 26th jan due commitments close office 6500 night total waste time money start finish night arrived tired 14 hours due start 730am day looking forward sleep quiet instead opposite 3 loud drunken northern bought women picked pub wasnt bad guy door prostitute visiting noise tired couldnt bothered move little sleep complained morning moved supposed office late tired hoping rest 2 drunk females door loud till hours morning dispite banging wall quiet wasnt bad fire alarm 630am dressed grabbed stuff reception told due hot shower complained stay hotel 4 days stayed international canary wharf world nice beds peace quiet 1000 night

HotelInfo.Name: Eurotraveller Hotel
